scripts.db:dev: sequelize db:drop --env development & sequelize  db:create --env development & sequelize  db:migrate --env development --debug
scripts.db:test: sequelize db:drop --env test & sequelize db:create --env test & sequelize db:migrate --env test --debug
scripts.db:prod: sequelize db:drop --env production & sequelize db:create --env production & sequelize db:migrate --env production --debug
scripts.db:local: sequelize db:drop --env local & sequelize db:create --env local & sequelize db:migrate --env local --debug
scripts.seed:dev: sequelize db:seed:undo:all --env development & sequelize db:seed:all --env development --debug
scripts.seed:test: sequelize db:seed:undo:all --env test & sequelize db:seed:all --env test --debug
scripts.seed:prod: sequelize db:seed:undo:all --env production & sequelize db:seed:all --env production --debug
scripts.seed:local: sequelize db:seed:undo:all --env local & sequelize db:seed:all --env local --debug
